contents:
效果很大

印度ISP已把TikTok在印度断网:

https://www.indiatoday.in/technology/news/story/after-ban-tiktok-now-blocked-in-india-as-isps-act-on-govt-order-1695567-2020-06-30

Apple和Google也已将TikTok从App Store和Play Store下架:

https://techcrunch.com/2020/07/01/apple-and-google-block-dozens-of-chinese-apps-in-india/
